channel.title: Comments on: The underworld thief returns from the dead

item.title: By: Mars Will Send No More
item.dc:creator: Mars Will Send No More
item.description: Reblogged this on <a href="http://marswillsendnomore.wordpress.com/2013/12/22/the-underworld-thief-returns-from-the-dead/" rel="nofollow">Mars Will Send No More</a> and commented: Love the feathered dinosaur illustration. Here's the article in Naturwissenschaften: http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s00114-013-1107-5
item.content:encoded:
Reblogged this on Mars Will Send No More and commented:
Love the feathered dinosaur illustration. Here’s the article in Naturwissenschaften: http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s00114-013-1107-5
